Container.Name: Docmost
Container.Overview:
Open-source collaborative wiki and documentation software Create, collaborate, and share knowledge seamlessly with Docmost. Ideal for managing your wiki, knowledge-base, documentation and a lot more.
Require before deploying: - Postgres - redis
Container.DonateText: Don't donate to me! Instead, please donate the creators of the apps, but if you insist

Config.Name: Application URL
Config.Description: The base URL of your application. It is optional, but useful for correct email links.

Config.Name: Application Secret
Config.Description: A random key used for application security.

Config.Name: Database URL
Config.Description: The connection URL for your PostgreSQL database. Exemple : postgresql://docmost:STRONG_DB_PASSWORD@db:5432/docmost?schema=public

Config.Name: Redis URL
Config.Description: The connection URL for your Redis server. exemple : redis://127.0.0.1:6379

Config.Name: WebUI
Config.Description: The port on which the application will run.
